item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. GitHub cuts AI deals with Google, Anthropic (696 points | 473 comments)
2. OpenAI builds first chip with Broadcom and TSMC, scales back foundry ambition (242 points | 155 comments)
3. The Influence of Japanese Archaeology on the Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (52 points | 2 comments)

6. Using an 8K TV as a Monitor (358 points | 382 comments)
7. The Eukaryote, the First Cell to Get Organized (11 points | 1 comment)

12. Launch HN: Integuru (YC W24) – Reverse-engineer internal APIs using LLMs (174 points | 63 comments)
13. Nuclear Fusion's New Idea: An Off-the-Shelf Stellarator (62 points | 18 comments)

19. SmartTube – an advanced player for set-top boxes and TVs running Android OS (30 points | 14 comments)
20. The electrostatic world of insects (166 points | 49 comments)

24. Five or Ten New Proofs of the Pythagorean Theorem (29 points | 7 comments)
25. When are two proofs essentially the same? (2007) (58 points | 84 comments)
26. Ancient Monkey: Pwning a 17-Year-Old Version of SpiderMonkey (85 points | 6 comments)
27. A deep history of Halloween (112 points | 43 comments)
28. InspectMind AI (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
29. AgiBot X1, a modular humanoid robot with high dof (37 points | 4 comments)
